newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian Tourism Q1 meets budget.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian Tourism Q1 meets budget.

text.p: Hotel group the Australian Tourism Group said on Thursday that the group's profit distributable income and revenue reached budget forecasts for the September quarter but gave no figures were given.
Australian Tourism reported a 29 percent rise in operating profit to A$12.5 million for the year to June 30, 1996.

Managing director Darryl Courtney-O Connor said in a statement room rates and hotel contribution margins were at record levels and directors were confident the group's budgets would be met for the 1996/97 financial year.
